muclient.script:
function DeleteWordBeforeCursor() local sel_end = GetInfo(237) if sel_end == 0 then local word_end = GetInfo(236) - 1 if word_end ~= 0 then local cmd = GetCommand() local word_begin = string.find(string.sub(cmd, 1, word_end), "%S*%s*$") if word_begin ~= nil then SetCommandSelection(word_begin, word_end) PasteCommand("") end end else PasteCommand("") end end
-- Redefine Ctrl+Backspace to delete word before caret position. AcceleratorTo("Ctrl+Backspace", "DeleteWordBeforeCursor()", sendto.script)
